Copyright © {{moment format="YYYY"}} {{settings.store_name}} All Rights Reserved. | 4825 East Ingram Street Mesa, Arizona 85205-3212, USA | {{lang 'footer.call_us' phone_number=settings.phone_number}}

The purpose of this website is to promote broad consumer understanding and knowledge of various health conditions. This website is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease nor should statements be construed as medical advice. Please consult your healthcare provider should you have specific questions regarding the diagnosis or treatment of any medical condition.

layout/base:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html class="no-js" lang="{{ locale_name }}">
<head>
  <title>{{ head.title }}</title>
  {{{ resourceHints }}}
  {{{ head.meta_tags }}}
  {{{ head.config }}}
  {{#block "head"}} {{/block}}
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">
  <link href="{{ head.favicon }}" rel="shortcut icon">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="//stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css" integrity="sha384-wvfXpqpZZVQGK6TAh5PVlGOfQNHSoD2xbE+QkPxCAFlNEevoEH3Sl0sibVcOQVnN" crossorigin="anonymous">
  <script>document.documentElement.className = document.documentElement.className.replace('no-js', 'js');</script>
  <script>window.lazySizesConfig = window.lazySizesConfig || {}; window.lazySizesConfig.loadMode = 1;</script>
  <script async src="{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.head_async.js'}}"></script>
  <style type="text/css" media="screen, print">
           @font-face {
               font-family: "FontAwesome";
				src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:Font Awesome 5 Free-Regular-400.otf'}}"),
				url("{{cdn 'webdav:Font Awesome 5 Free-Solid-900.otf'}}")
           }
</style>
  {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/theme.css'}}}
  <!-- Apex google tracking  -->
  <meta name="google-site-verification" content="yisIlcxJ6S4Ra8z4vr7vtgpPF1eDBcCSY6UY7gGv7_I" />
  <meta name="p:domain_verify" content="3c9cb34b27bf0ac6ca5bd7e63ac1ae0e"/>
  <script>
    (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
      w[l] = w[l] || [];
      w[l].push({
        'gtm.start': new Date().getTime(),
        event: 'gtm.js'
      });
      var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
        j = d.createElement(s),
        dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
      j.async = true;
      j.src =
        'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
      f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
    })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-MMH33S');
  </script>
  {{{head.scripts}}}
  {{{head.rsslinks}}}
  {{{snippet 'htmlhead'}}}
</head>
<body class="{{#if page_type '===' 'default'}}template-home{{else if page_type '===' 'blog'}}blog{{else if page_type '===' 'blog_post'}}blog{{else}}template-page{{/if}}" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/WebPage">
  <noscript><iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-MMH33S" height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript>
  <iframe frameborder="0" scrolling="no" height="1" width="20" id="cj_conversion"  style="display:none;visibility:hidden"/> </iframe>
  <script type="text/javascript">
  function readCookie(name) {
  var nameEQ = name + "=";
  var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
  for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
  var c = ca[i];
  while (c.charAt(0) === ' ') {
  c = c.substring(1,c.length);
  }
  if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) === 0) {
  return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
  }
  }
  return null;
  }
  var src=
  'https://www.emjcd.com/tags/c?containerTagId=35086&CID=1557892&TYPE=417465&CURRENCY=USD&OID=' + '%%ORDER_ID%%' + '&AMOUNT=' + '%%ORDER_SUBTOTAL_DISCOUNTED%%' + '&ITEMx=' + '%%GLOBAL_SKU%%' + '&QTYx=' + '%%GLOBAL_ProductQuantity%%' + '&DCNTx' + '%%GLOBAL_DiscountAmount%%' + '&OID=' + '%%GLOBAL_OrderNumber%%' + '&DISCOUNT=' + '%%GLOBAL_DiscountAmount%%' + '&COUPON=' + '%%GLOBAL_CouponCode%%' + '&CJEVENT=' + 
  readCookie('cjevent');
  document.getElementById('cj_conversion').src = src;
  </script>
  {{{snippet 'header'}}}
  {{> components/header/header }}
  {{> components/common/body }}
  {{> components/footer/footer }}
  <script>window.__webpack_public_path__ = "{{cdn 'assets/dist/'}}";</script>
  <script src="{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.main.js'}}"></script>
  <script>
    window.stencilBootstrap("{{page_type}}", {{jsContext}}).load();
  </script>
  {{{footer.scripts}}}
  <!-- End of footer.scripts -->
  {{{snippet 'footer'}}}
</body>
</html>
pages/custom/category/foot-pain:
--- category: shop_by_price: true products: limit: 12 --- {{inject "categoryProductsPerPage" theme_settings.categorypage_products_per_page}} {{#partial "page"}}

Your feet don't have to hurt

{{#if category.description}}{{{category.description}}}{{/if}}

Your sore feet have been dreaming of our shoes.

Shoes that work as hard as you do

Unparalleled comfort and support

We don't just make comfortable shoes, we take it a step further and create shoes based on the latest biomechanical research, cutting-edge materials and innovative design. Advanced features are meticulously built into each shoe to offer midfoot and rearfoot stability, pressure relief on the heel, and superior shock absorption for the foot and musculoskeletal system.

The foundation of good health

It all starts with the feet

Wearing the right shoes can make all the difference when you're on your feet all day. Your footwear determines how the stress and shock your feet absorb is distributed on the foot and transferred to the lower extremities and spine. Aside from offering supreme comfort, Apex Shoes are designed to provide proper support to the foot while preventing or minimizing the risk of issues like muscle fatigue, plantar fasciitis and back or joint pain.

We've been doing this since 1946

That's why we're the best in the industry

Apex has been making feet happy since 1946, so we know what goes into making a great pair of shoes. When you put on a pair of our shoes, you can rest assured that they were developed and manufactured based on over 70 years' experience. Each shoe design is also rigorously tested by our in-house team of experts to ensure it delivers the best comfort, support and fit for whatever your footwear needs may be.

Featured Shoes

Lace Walker Black

Shop Women's Shop Men's

Lace Walker White

Shop Women's Shop Men's

Apex footwear is designed to provide quick relief from pain and discomfort. They’ll even protect diabetic feet from the threat of diabetic foot ulcers.

  • Padded Collar & Tongue
    Provides cushioned comfort and prevents heel slippage
  • Biomechanical Footbed
    Contoured EVA insole provides support, cushioning and shock absorption
  • Multi-Density Midsole
    Strategically placed firm EVA under medial arch for additional support
  • Customization
    The added EVA insole allows you to easily customize the comfort and fit of the shoe by trimming the insole at the areas of pressure. The insole may also be fully removed for additional depth.
  • Molded External Heel Counter
    For supported rearfoot control

You may also want to consider
